alert.note: Alert for Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 3:16PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL LEA...NORTHWESTERN WINKLER AND NORTHEASTERN LOVING COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM MDT... At 316 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles west of Jal, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Lea, northwestern Winkler and northeastern Loving Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
